title: Looking to try wombos in Bronze!
body: one of my best champs is yasuo and id love to find a decend malphite to try and get to silver/gold? No rage just tryin hard to carry myself out hell

replies.body:
Hey hey hey I play Yas and malphite, add me and we can talk it through? Ended B1 last season but didn't play much ranked... Also my op.gg is bugged or something I'm not sure so don't rely on that but I'd love to have a ranked partner! I only play flex though... Is that okay?

Edit: going away for 2 days, I'll be on Tuesday at the latest.
ay ill play flex too man, idm. ill add ya now
